parameters.query: INSERT INTO bank_statements (bank_code, bank_name, account_number, transaction_date, description, counterparty_name, deposit_amount, withdrawal_amount, balance, category, source_type, source_row_number, search_text) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4::date, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9, $10, $11, $12, $13) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING RETURNING id
SELECT * FROM bank_statements WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR bank_code = $1) AND ($2::text IS NULL OR account_number = $2) ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT bs.id as statement_id, bs.deposit_amount, bs.withdrawal_amount, bs.description, bs.transaction_date, ps.id as settlement_id, ps.gross_revenue, ABS(bs.deposit_amount - ps.gross_revenue) as diff FROM bank_statements bs CROSS JOIN profit_settlements ps WHERE bs.is_reconciled = false AND bs.deposit_amount > 0 AND ABS(bs.deposit_amount - ps.gross_revenue) < 100 AND ABS(bs.transaction_date - ps.settled_at::date) <= 5 ORDER BY diff ASC LIMIT 50
UPDATE bank_statements SET is_reconciled = true, payment_id = $1::uuid WHERE id = $2::uuid RETURNING id
SELECT COUNT(*) as receipt_count, SUM(amount) as receipt_total FROM receipts WHERE transaction_date >= $1::date AND transaction_date <= $2::date

SELECT COUNT(*) as statement_count, SUM(deposit_amount) as deposit_total, SUM(withdrawal_amount) as withdrawal_total FROM bank_statements WHERE transaction_date >= $1::date AND transaction_date <= $2::date
INSERT INTO document_archives (archive_type, archive_period, archive_url, document_count, total_amount, backup_locations) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6::jsonb) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING RETURNING id
